EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-05-15 Intro to Containers and Serverless.5/15 First Send - Marketo.Emai
EmailTemplate.subject: How To Leverage Containers & Serverless
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-intro-containers-serverless-2/]]>
Register & Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-intro-containers-serverless-2/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Join us May 15, 2019 at 11am for an introduction to containers and serverless and an overview on how these technologies will impact your multicloud strategy.
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-intro-containers-serverless-2/]]>
You will learn about the drivers and best practices when leveraging these technologies, including:
- Practical use cases for container technology - Future considerations for serverless architecture - Best practices for managing resources for both application technologies - Additional considerations as your multicloud strategy expands
I hope you'll join us! Register now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-intro-containers-serverless-2/]]> and enter to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card.
Thanks, Andrew
PS. If you can't attend, register anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-intro-containers-serverless-2/]]> and we will send you the recording afterward.
